com.sails.map

Class MapViewPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sails.map.MapViewPosition

  • public class MapViewPosition
extends java.lang.Object
    A MapViewPosition stores the latitude and longitude coordinates of a MapView together with its zoom level.

      • moveCenter

        public void moveCenter(float moveHorizontal,
              float moveVertical)
        Moves the center position of the map by the given amount of pixels without an animation.
        Parameters:
        moveHorizontal - the amount of pixels to move this MapViewPosition horizontally.
        moveVertical - the amount of pixels to move this MapViewPosition vertically.

      • setCenter

        Sets the new center position of the map without an animation.
        Parameters:
        geoPoint - the new center position of the map.

      • setZoomLevel

        public void setZoomLevel(byte zoomLevel)
        Sets the new zoom level of the map without an animation.
        Parameters:
        zoomLevel - the new zoom level of the map.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given zoom level is negative.

      • zoom

        public void zoom(byte zoomLevelDiff,
        float scaleFactorStart)
        Starts an animation to increase or decrease the current zoom level.
        Parameters:
        zoomLevelDiff - the difference to the current zoom level.
        scaleFactorStart - the scale factor at the begin of the animation.

      • zoomIn

        Starts an animation to increase the current zoom level by one.

        Starts an animation to decrease the current zoom level by one.
